title: Chelsea Handler
summary: Chelsea Joy Handler[1] (born February 25, 1975)[2] is an American comedian, actress, writer, television host, and producer. She hosted the late-night talk show Chelsea Lately on the E! network from 2007 to 2014 and released a documentary series, Chelsea Does, on Netflix in January 2016.[3] Between 2016 and 2017, Handler hosted the talk show Chelsea on Netflix.[4]
